1000101010100101 1100101111100011 1 -> sum: 0101011010001001, cout: 1
1111000001001010 0000001111111101 1 -> sum: 1111010001001000, cout: 0
0000000111001110 0011100110001000 0 -> sum: 0011101101010110, cout: 0
0110010011000000 1001001001110010 1 -> sum: 1111011100110011, cout: 0
1111111000011001 1110010010000101 1 -> sum: 1110001010011111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
